title: Drawing, "Flatware Handles"
description:
Recto: Designs for flatware, most of which incorporate foliate motifs at the tips of the handles, are lined up vertically over the full page. One partial view appears in the top right corner.

Versto: The page is covered by designs for flatware, vertically and horizontally placed, and in some instances, overlapping. The designs encompass foliate, geometric and abstract motifs, and In several instances, cover the entire handle.
